trans-unit.source: Fix a small packaging bug from the 0.8.5 release. (Thanks to Björn Häuser for bringing this to my attention.)
trans-unit.target: 修复了0.8.5版本中的一个小包装错误。（感谢BjörnHäuser引起我的注意。）

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug that happens after log rotation when multiple processes are witting to the same log file. Each process ends up writing to their own log file (“log.1” or “log.2” instead of “log”). The fix is simply to reopen the log file and check the size again. I do not believe this bug results in data loss; however, this certainly was not the desired behavior. (A big thanks goes to Oliver Tonnhofer for finding, documenting, and providing a patch for this bug.)
trans-unit.target: 修复了多个进程将同一个日志文件写入同一日志文件后，日志轮换后发生的错误。每个进程最终都写入其自己的日志文件（“ log.1”或“ log.2”而不是“ log”）。解决方法只是重新打开日志文件并再次检查大小。我认为此错误不会导致数据丢失；但是，这当然不是期望的行为。（非常感谢Oliver Tonnhofer查找，记录并提供了此错误的补丁。）

trans-unit.source: Fixed a typo in the package description (incorrect class name)
trans-unit.target: 修正了包描述中的一个错别字(错误的类名)。

trans-unit.source: Fixed minor spelling mistakes
trans-unit.target: 修正小的拼写错误

trans-unit.target: 修复了

trans-unit.source: Found and resolved another issue with older logging packages that do not support encoding.
trans-unit.target: 发现并解决了另一个不支持编码的旧日志包的问题。

trans-unit.source: Handle logging.shutdown() in Python 2.7+. Close the lock file stream via close().
trans-unit.target: 在Python 2.7+中处理logging.shutdown()。通过close()关闭锁文件流。

trans-unit.source: More gracefully handle out of disk space scenarios. Prevent release() from throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 更优雅地处理磁盘空间不足的情况。防止release()抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: Now importing “codecs” directly; I found some slight differences in the logging module in different Python 2.4.x releases that caused the module to fail to load.
trans-unit.target: 现在直接导入“编解码器”；我在不同的Python 2.4.x版本中的日志记录模块中发现了一些细微的差异，导致该模块无法加载。

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概述

trans-unit.source: Resolved a minor issue where lock-files would be improperly named if the log file contained “.log” in the middle of the log name. For example, if you log file was “/var/log/mycompany.logging.mysource.log”, the lock file would be named “/var/log/mycompany.ging.mysource.lock”, which is not correct. Thanks to Dirk Rothe for pointing this out. Since this introduce a slight lock-file behavior difference, make sure all concurrent writers are updated to 0.8.4 at the same time if this issue effects you.
trans-unit.target: 解决了一个较小的问题，即如果日志文件的日志名称中间包含“ .log”，则锁定文件的名称将不正确。例如，如果您的日志文件是“ /var/log/mycompany.logging.mysource.log”，则锁定文件将被命名为“ /var/log/mycompany.ging.mysource.lock”，这是不正确的。感谢Dirk Rothe指出这一点。由于这样做会导致锁文件行为略有不同，因此，如果此问题影响您，请确保同时将所有并发写入器更新到0.8.4。

trans-unit.source: Revamp file opening/closing and file-locking internals (inspired by feedback from Vinay Sajip.)
trans-unit.target: 修改文件的打开/关闭和文件锁定的内部结构(受Vinay Sajip反馈的启发)。

trans-unit.target: 感谢Vince Carney，Arif Kasim，Matt Drew，Nick Coghlan和Dan Callaghan提供的错误报告。现在可以在此处填充错误：https : //bugs.launchpad.net/python-concurrent-log-handler。已解决的错误 Red Hat Bug＃858912和Python Bug＃15960

trans-unit.target: The

trans-unit.source: This example shows you how to use this log handler with the logging config file parser. This allows you to keep your logging configuration code separate from your application code.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了如何使用这个日志处理程序与日志配置文件解析器。这允许您将您的日志配置代码与您的应用程序代码分开。

trans-unit.source: This module attempts to preserve log records at all cost. This means that log files will grow larger than the specified maximum (rotation) size. So if disk space is tight, you may want to stick with
trans-unit.target: 该模块试图不惜一切代价保存日志记录。这意味着,日志文件的增长将大于指定的最大(旋转)尺寸。因此,如果磁盘空间紧张,你可能会想坚持使用

trans-unit.source: This module has had minimal testing in a multi-threaded process. I see no reason why this should be an issue, but no stress-testing has been done in a threaded situation. If this is important to you, you could always add threading support to the
trans-unit.target: 这个模块在多线程进程中的测试很少。我不明白为什么这应该是一个问题,但没有在线程情况下进行压力测试。如果这对你来说很重要,你可以随时将线程支持添加到

trans-unit.source: This module provides an additional log handler for Python’s standard logging package (PEP 282). This handler will write log events to log file which is rotated when the log file reaches a certain size. Multiple processes can safely write to the same log file concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 该模块为Python的标准日志记录程序包（PEP 282）提供了一个额外的日志处理程序。该处理程序会将日志事件写入日志文件，当日志文件达到一定大小时，该日志文件将旋转。多个进程可以安全地同时写入同一日志文件。

trans-unit.source: This package bundles portalocker to deal with file locking. Please be aware that portalocker only supports Unix (posix) an NT platforms at this time, and therefore this package only supports those platforms as well.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包捆绑了portalocker来处理文件锁定。请注意，Portalocker目前仅支持Unix（posix）NT平台，因此该软件包也仅支持这些平台。
